name: 陳銘崑
objective:
由於產業環境辦化及科技創新速度，影響企業之營運模式。本課程旨在針對在此產業環境辦畫下，企業經營模式之變革與科技創新對經營模式之變革影響。課程中， 除了理論解析外並輔以企業實務個案作研討。
Due to the change of industry environment and the speed of technological innovation, the business models of enterprise are impacted. The purpose of this course will study the transform of business model and the impact of technological innovation of the business model. In the course, besides the theory will be included, the business practices case will also be covered.
